description:
The cold-faced killer Shiqi and the fishing village girl Qianxiao met because of the mysterious time wheel. One wanted to "quit" to find freedom, and the other wanted to "leave the island" to find excitement. They decided to temporarily cooperate and become "one-day time wheel partners", starting a romantic adventure with surprises and joys in the bustling metropolis. In this process, the relationship between Shiqi and Qianxiao quietly changed, from the initial enemies to tacit partners. While the two hearts inadvertently got closer, they didn`t know that the secret behind the time wheel was also quietly affecting the fate of the two...
source: bangumi.tv/googletranslate
